discourse_list.title: Is there a Mastodon server for Eth?

content.content: With the latest Elon Musk stuff,  should the Eth community run a mastodon server?
content.GPT-summary: The post is a question about whether there is a Mastodon server for Eth and suggests that the Eth community should run one in light of recent events involving Elon Musk. The post does not fit neatly into any of the listed topics, but it can be categorized as a 3rd party asking questions about the proposal of creating a Mastodon server for Eth. Additionally, the post extends to the proposal by suggesting that the Eth community should run a Mastodon server.

content.content: Not that I know of. Happy to see something being setup
https://cryptodon.lol/ is probably the closest thing.
I’d love this and would happily help set it up.

Yup, cryptodon.lol is the place to be. Here are some accounts to get you started. I’ll put people’s affiliations from memory, apologies if I get some of them wrong: phil (@phil@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - MEV research, runs the server lefterisjp (@lefteris@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - Rotki and stewardship of lots of projects nick.eth (@weka@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - ENS Vitalik Buterin (@vbuterin@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - had some role in ethereum early on, I forget the details barnabé (@barnabe@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - EF researcher fradamt (@fradamt@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - EF researcher Neiman (@neiman@cryptodon.lol) - cryptodon.lol - Esteroids Phil’s doing a great job running the server so I’d suggest reaching out to him if you want to help, but more options also wouldn’t do any harm.
